CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many labels are in this radar chart?
How many dimensions are in this radar chart?

SRP.Q: In the radar chart, what is the next dimension in the clockwise direction from Capital Appreciation Rate?
SRP.A: The next dimension clockwise from Capital Appreciation Rate is Mortgage Payment as Rate of Income

SRP.Q: In the radar chart, what is the next dimension in the counterclockwise direction from Transaction Volume Growth?
SRP.A: The next dimension counterclockwise from Capital Appreciation Rate is Transaction Volume Growth.

SRP.Q: On the Transaction Volume Growth, is the point for port inside or outside the point for ville?
SRP.A: On the Transaction Volume Growth, the point for port is outside the point for ville.

VPR.Q: Which label encloses the largest score in the radar chart?
VPR.A: label {Rental Yield} encloses the largest score

VPR.Q: What are the strongest and weakest dimension of ville?
VPR.A: The strongest aspect is {Rental Yield}, while the weakest aspect is{ Capital Appreciation Rate}.

VPR.Q: On dimension Capital Appreciation Rate, which label scores the highest?
VPR.A: On Capital Appreciation Rate, label {ville} scores the highest.

VPR.Q: On dimension Capital Appreciation Rate, which label scores the highest?
VPR.A: On Capital Appreciation Rate, label {ville} scores the lowest.

VE.Q: What is the value of port on the Capital Appreciation Rate in the radar chart?
VE.A: The value of port on the Safety dimension is {90}.

VE.Q: What is the value of port on the Transaction Volume Growth in the radar chart?
VE.A: The value of port on the Safety dimension is {72}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum value of label port across all dimensions in the radar chart?
EVJ.A: The maximum value of port across all dimensions is {73}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum value of label ville across all dimensions in the radar chart?
EVJ.A: The minimum value of ville across all dimensions is {55}.

SC.Q: What is the average value of Mortgage Payment as Rate of Income
SC.A: The average value of Mortgage Payment as Rate of Income is {70.0}.

SC.Q: What is the average value of ville
SC.A: The average value of ville is {73.4}.

NF.Q: For port in the radar chart, which dimensions have scores between 62 and 83? Please list the dimensions and corresponding scores.
Which labels have scores below 69 for the Transaction Volume Growth dimension? Please list the labels and corresponding scores.
Which labels have scores above 85 for the Capital Appreciation Rate dimension? Please list the labels and corresponding scores.

NC.Q: For ville, which dimension has a higher score: Rental Yield or Mortgage Payment as Rate of Income?
NC.A: {Rental Yield} has a higher score than Mortgage Payment as Rate of Income for ville.

NC.Q: For ville, which dimension has a higher score: Mortgage Payment as Rate of Income or Price Volatility Index?
NC.A: {Mortgage Payment as Rate of Income} has a higher score than Price Volatility Index for ville.

NC.Q: On Price Volatility Index, which label has a higher score: port or the ville?
NC.A: {ville} has a higher score on Price Volatility Index compared to port.

NC.Q: For ville, which dimension has a higher score: Transaction Volume Growth or Price Volatility Index or Capital Appreciation Rate?
NC.A: {Transaction Volume Growth} has a higher score for ville.

MSR.Q: For port, based on the data shown in the radar chart, which dimension does it most need to improve?
MSR.A: port most needs to improve its {Price Volatility Index}.

MSR.Q: In the radar chart, which label has the strongest overall capability across all labels?
MSR.A: The label with the strongest overall capability is {ville}.

MSR.Q: In the radar chart, which label has the weaknest overall capability across all labels?
MSR.A: The label with the weaknest overall capability is {port}.
